title: The Great British Tuck Shop
description: The ultimate book of sweetie nostalgia! From the creators of the TV Cream website and the authors of TV Cream Toys comes the ultimate in 70s and 80s nostalgia, acolorful, witty, and irreverant encyclopedia of all the sweets and crisps of your youth. From Mojos to Rainbrow Drops, Space Raiders to Trios, Corona to Kia Ora, and everything in between.
author: Steve    Berry
